subject: Re: METS Website Updates
preview: 2 hours added to harvest and closed.

full_threads.body: 2 hours added to harvest and closed.

Hi Evangeline, 

Great, confirmed the latest round of changes have been completed. You can view them here: https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/

Please let us know if we can help further.

https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/

chris, please check. i just used a random image from the site.

30mins

Hi @glen, can you please assist with:

1. on page https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/ adding a new section.

2. Adding the top 4 FAQs found on the PDF attachment. 

3. Adding a button that links to the PDF (already in media) styled to match "Ways to pay" section. 

Email thread is below.

That's perfect, let's do that.

Evangeline Tzourtzouklis
Digital Marketing AdvisorScope (Aust) Ltd1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673

Hi Evangeline, 

You are most welcome. 

No need to apologise. We can, although I am conscious of the number of questions and answers contained on the PDF compared to the other FAQ blocks. If we were to add all the questions, they would disrupt the balance of the page. 

To suggest an alternative, I recommend adding the top 3 or 4 FAQs. We can then add a button as seen on the "ways to pay" section on the page: https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/ (screenshot attached). 

Please let me know your thoughts on the above and we'll action accordingly.

Hi Chris,

Thank you so much for actioning that so quickly.

Re: the RPL FAQs, can you please add them as an accordion at the bottom of the page? Apologies, I should have specified.

Kind regards,

Evangeline

Evangeline Tzourtzouklis
Digital Marketing AdvisorScope (Aust) Ltd1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673

Hi Evangeline, 

Great news, we have completed most of your requested updates. The completed updates can be reviewed here: 

1. Remove the Funding availability for the following courses:
https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid009-provide-cardiopulmonary-resuscitation-cpr/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid011-provide-first-aid/
https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid012-provide-an-emergency-first-aid-response-in-an-education-and-care-setting/

2. Childrens services tile - put in order https://mets.edu.au/children-services/
  1. Cert III
  2. Diploma
  3. Child protection
  4. HLTAID012
3. RPL FAQ's to also be featured on course page link.
https://mets.edu.au/ways-to-learn/recognition-of-prior-learning/

4. Cert III + Cert IV Disability Course Tiles currently sitting under Comm services;
https://mets.edu.au/community-services/ Needs to be moved to https://mets.edu.au/individual-support-disability-services/

5. Add this course https://mets.edu.au/courses/chcprt00-identify-and-respond-to-children-and-young-people-at-risk/ onto this page: https://mets.edu.au/short-courses/
 
Pending updates with request for clarification

Need to include RPL FAQ's to landing RPL page (attached)
https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/

- Please let us know where you would like the RPL FAQs to feature, and also how they should appear. E.g. a button to open PDF or if they are to feature on the page.

90mins

- done removing the funding availability
- done adding RPL FAQ's to landing RPL page
- done reordering Childrens services tile
- done updating courses for Comm services, Individual Support & Disability Services and short courses

@chris to clarify question: 
  • Need to include RPL FAQ's to landing RPL page (attached)
https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/

Hi Evangeline,

I hope this message finds you well.

I'll be taking over on behalf of Heath. We've received your request and have already initiated the necessary actions. Expect a follow-up from us by tomorrow once the task is completed.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox
Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Unknown Workflow** workflow

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Hope you are well.


Can you please make the following changes to the METS website:


  • Remove the Funding availability for the following courses:
    • HLTAID009

https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid009-provide-cardiopulmonary-resuscitation-cpr/

    • HLTAID011

https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid011-provide-first-aid/

    • HLTAID012

https://mets.edu.au/courses/hltaid012-provide-an-emergency-first-aid-response-in-an-education-and-care-setting/


  • Childrens services tile - put in order https://mets.edu.au/children-services/
  1. Cert III
  2. Diploma
  3. Child protection
  4. HLTAID012


  • Republish the 'download a brochure' component


  • Need to include RPL FAQ's to landing RPL page (attached)

https://mets.edu.au/student-information/student-faqs/


To also be featured on course page link

https://mets.edu.au/ways-to-learn/recognition-of-prior-learning/



  • Cert III + Cert IV Disability Course Tiles currently sitting under Comm services;

https://mets.edu.au/community-services/


Needs to be moved to https://mets.edu.au/individual-support-disability-services/



  • Add this course https://mets.edu.au/courses/chcprt00-identify-and-respond-to-children-and-young-people-at-risk/ onto this page: https://mets.edu.au/short-courses/


Hopefully this makes sense. Please let me know how you go and roughly how long this will take to action.



Kind regards,

Evangeline



Evangeline Tzourtzouklis
Digital Marketing Advisor
Scope (Aust) Ltd
1300 472 673

scopeaust.org.au | 1300 472 673
